/usr/bin/c++ -rdynamic -pthread CMakeFiles/mpigpu.dir/read.o CMakeFiles/mpigpu.dir/mpigpu.o CMakeFiles/mpigpu.dir/gpuhelper.o -o mpigpu   -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib  -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib -Wl,-Bstatic -lcudart_static -Wl,-Bdynamic -ldl -lrt -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
